projects.title: MovieSearch
projects.description:
MovieSearch is a modern web application for searching movies and TV series.
The app allows users to easily find interesting movies and shows, use filters, save favorite films to a "Favorites" list, and view the history of their search queries.

projects.title: GitHub User Explorer
projects.description:
GitHub User Explorer is an application for searching GitHub users with detailed account statistics.
It features username search, data visualization (repositories, languages, followers), and a search history.

projects.title: CRM application system
projects.description: The CRM Application for Requests is an internal web application for an online education center, designed for receiving, tracking, and processing enrollment requests for various IT courses.

projects.title: UI-kit library
projects.description:
A UI-kit library is a professionally designed set of user interface components for use in commercial web applications.
The library provides a consistent style, enables rapid interface development, and accelerates the overall product development process.
